cards.title: Moonwolf
powers: {Moonwolf} deals 1 Target 2 Melee damage, then herself 1 Melee damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One target deals itself 1 Melee damage, then regains 2 HP.
The enviroment deals a Hero 2 Radiant Damage, then that Hero may draw a card and play a card.

openingLines.default: I am a sexy wolf lady, grr!

cards.title: Pull of the Moon
body: Whenever {Moonwolf} takes Damage, add tokens equal to the damage taken to this card.
This card is indestructible.

flavorQuotes.text: The moon watches over me,{BR}and in turn I draw power from her.

cards.title: Blind Rage
body: {Moonwolf} deals up to 3 targets 2 melee damage each.
If a Hero Target was damaged by this card, {Moonwolf} deals up to 2 targets 2 melee damage each.

cards.title: Forced Change
body: {Moonwolf} deals herself 2 Melee damage.
Search your deck for a Feral card, and put the selected card into play or your hand, then shuffle your deck.

flavorQuotes.text: Luna! Your priestess needs your power!.

cards.title: Taste for Blood
body: {Moonwolf} deals one target 4 Melee damage.
If the target took damage, {Moonwolf} regains 2 HP.

flavorQuotes.text: There's a peace in embracing your true nature.

cards.title: Howl at the Moon
body: Remove 3 tokens from Pull of the Moon. If you do, each Hero Target regains 1 HP.
Increase all Damage dealt by Hero Targets by 1 until the start of your turn.

cards.title: Rampage
body: {Moonwolf} deals herself 1 Melee damage.
Destroy up to 2 Ongoing or Enviroment cards.
{Moonwolf} regains 1 HP for each card destroyed this way.

flavorQuotes.text: Sorry about the dishes.{BR}You know how I get...

cards.title: Moonlit Interlude
body: {Moonwolf} and another Hero character card each regain 2 HP, then choose one of these Hero's to play a card.

flavorQuotes.text: I think we have time, don't you...

cards.title: Draw out the Beast
body: Remove up to 5 tokens from Pull of the Moon.
Reveal X cards where the X is the number of tokens removed, put one card into play and the remaining cards into the trash.
cards.flavorText: These blessing, accepted{BR}not chosen{BR}to change the world.{BR}Prayer of Luna's Chosen

cards.title: Luna's Avatar
body: Increase Melee damage dealt by {Moonwolf} to non-Hero targets by 2.
At the start of your turn, remove 3 tokens from Pull of the Moon, or destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: I didn't expect her to be so beautiful.

cards.title: Frenzied Strikes
body: You may use {Moonwolf}'s innate power an additional time during your power phase.
If you do, {Moonwolf} deals herself 1 melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Stop! You will tear yourself apart.

cards.title: Tears of the Moon
body: At the start of your turn, {Moonwolf} regains 1 HP.
Whenever {Moonwolf} is dealt damage, she may remove 2 tokens from Pull of the Moon to regain 1 HP.

flavorQuotes.text: My Mistress demands much,{BR}but I know she cares.

cards.title: Cycle of Life
body: At the start of your turn, {Moonwolf} regains 1 HP.
Damage {Moonwolf} deals to Enviroment targets is Irreducible and increased by 2.

flavorQuotes.text: Did you see what she did to Orbo?{BR}I threw up.

cards.title: New Moon Rising
body: If {Moonwolf} would be reduced to 0 or fewer HP, remove all tokens from Pull of the Moon and restore {Moonwolf} to HP equal to the amount of tokens removed this way.
Then, destroy this card.

cards.title: Channel the Moon
body: Redirect all Damage that would be dealt to Hero Targets to {Moonwolf}.
Whenever {Moonwolf} takes Damage, you may prevent that damage by removing X tokens from Pull of the Moon, where X is the amount of damage being dealt.
At the start of your turn, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: How can one women hold such power.

cards.title: Moon Priestess
powers: Add 2 tokens to Pull of the Moon, then select a Hero to regain 2 HP and draw a card.

flavorQuotes.text: Go forth, Wraith. The moon demands vengeance.

cards.title: Blood Sacrifice
body: {Moonwolf} deals herself 2 Melee damage, then adds 3 tokens to Pull of the Moon.
You may play a card now.
